testcase.name: TC17 Kullanici yeni acilan window'u test edebilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "wduUrl" anasayfaya gider...................................passed Then Login Portal elementine kadar asagi iner...............................passed And Login Portal a tiklar...................................................passed Then Acilan yeni window a gecer.............................................passed And username kutusuna deger yazar...........................................passed And password kutusuna deger yazar...........................................passed Then webuniversity login butonuna basar.....................................passed And Popup ta cikan yazinin validation failed oldugunu test eder.............passed And OK diyerek popup i kapatir..............................................passed Then ilk sayfaya geri doner.................................................passed And ilk sayfaya dondugunu test eder.........................................passed And acilan tum sayfalari kapatir............................................passed
